TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit SelectionItemPattern/SelectionItemPatternInformation extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.
Gets a value that indicates whether an item is selected.
Docs.value: if the item is selected; otherwise .

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to remove an element from the collection of currently selected items.
[!code-csharp[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.vb#103)] [!code-csharp[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.cs#105)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.vb#105)]

Docs.summary: Gets the that supports the control pattern and acts as the container for the calling object.
Docs.value: The container object. The default is a null reference ( in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]).

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> representing the selection container of a selection item.
[!code-csharp[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.vb#103)]
